feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-01-18T03:57:58.885668Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;失去我的儿子 – Lars Doucet</stitle>; <id>;https://www.fortressofdoors.com/i-lost-my-son/</id>; <updated>;2024 -01-18T02：56：35.352274Z </更新>; <link href =“https://www.fortressofdoors.com/i-lost-my-son/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;卢克普拉托</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukeplato</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.fortressofdoors.com/content /images/size/w2000/2023/12/DALL-E-2023-12-02-15.50.18---宁静-沉思场景灵感来自埃塞克斯索弗罗尼长老-引用.-图像描绘-a-和平景观-with-a-deep--dark-abyss-in-the-backg.png" style="width: 220px;高度：220px;" />;<br />;10 月 20 日，Lars Doucet 7 岁的儿子在医疗过程中心脏骤停，导致灾难性脑损伤。尽管情况严重，Lars 和他的妻子仍在提供全面的帮助全天候照顾他们的儿子，他还活着，但无法说话或有意移动。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#losing-my-son-lars-doucet" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39036842" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;哪个单词以“y”开头并且在这张图片中看起来像一把斧子？（2021）< /stitle>; <id>;https://english.stackexchange.com/questions/395382/which-word-begins-with-y-and-looks-like-an-axe-in-this-picture</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T22:56:35.354482Z</更新>; <link href="https://english.stackexchange.com/questions/395382/which-word-begins-with-y-and-looks-like -an-axe-in-this-picture"/>; <作者>; <名称>;flexagoon</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=flexagoon</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/xzaQ9.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了一个带有字母和图像的塑料球，其中每个图像代表一个以相应字母开头的单词。然而，字母 Y 的图像看起来像一把斧子，作者找不到以 Y 开头的 axe 英语单词。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#which-word-begins-with-y-and-looks-like-an-axe- in-this-picture-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39034160" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;可移植 Web 文档 – 替代方案基于 HTML5 和 Web 标准的 PDF</stitle>; <id>;https://getpolarized.io/2019/05/11/portable-web-documents.html</id>; <updated>;2024-01-18T02:56： 35.354942Z</更新>; <link href="https://getpolarized.io/2019/05/11/portable-web-documents.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;edweis</名称>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=edweis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://getpolarized.io/static/polar-icon-55956145ffc8674cab6a3d312777ae95 .png"样式="宽度：220px； height: 221px;" />;<br />;可移植 Web 文档 (PWD) 是一种类似于 PDF 的技术，支持完整 HTML 文档的离线缓存。PWD 结合了 PDF 和 HTML 内容的优点，允许流畅的布局并能够离线缓存页面。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#portable-web-documents-an-alternative-to-pdf-based-on-html5-and-web-standards" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39036774" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Htmx 和 Web 组件：完美匹配</stitle>; <id>;https:// binaryigor.com/htmx-and-web-components-a-perfect-match.html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-18T02:56:35.355374Z</更新>; <link href="https://binaryigor .com/htmx-and-web-components-a-perfect-match.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;alexzeitler</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alexzeitler </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://binaryigor.com/assets/images/htmx-and-web-components/confirmable-modal_1902e9bdfb0671ce.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 93px;" />;<br />;Web 组件是一组浏览器 API，允许我们创建自定义 HTML 元素。它们简化了创建可重用和隔离的 UI 组件的过程，无需复杂的工具或特定于框架的知识. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#htmx-and-web-components-a-perfect-match" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39036693" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2023 年黑客新闻热门书籍</stitle>; <id>;https://hnreads.com/post/top40_2023/</id>; <updated>;2024 -01-17T22:56:35.355795Z</更新>; <link href="https://hnreads.com/post/top40_2023/"/>; <作者>; <name>;kristianp</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kristianp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hnreads.com/img/logo.jpeg" style="宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;HN Reads 是一个新网站，用于处理 Hacker News 上提到的书籍数据。该网站使用 OpenAI gpt3.5 聊天 API 从评论中提取书籍详细信息，并对标题进行标准化。生成的信息已汇总并列出了 2023 年排名前 40 的图书。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-hacker-news-top-books-of-2023" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39034421" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AlphaGeometry：奥林匹克级几何人工智能系统</stitle>; <id>;https://deepmind。 google/discover/blog/alphageometry-an-olympiad-level-ai-system-for-geometry/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T16:56:35.356197Z</更新>; <link href="https: //deepmind.google/discover/blog/alphageometry-an-olympiad-level-ai-system-for-geometry/"/>; <author>; <name>;FlawedReformer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=FlawedReformer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/tVTh_ZCW5Qozy4vOCpMH06B7Ac_eF7fmEULMMTwDellOh6hnOMUtf28toD68N527IHQTlBWfBCHcZykYPMdrS48yvuEcJKM JG8rU3YRM3u5Ojn3JXnc=w1072-h603-n-nu" 样式=“宽度：220px； height: 124px;" />;<br />;AlphaGeometry 是一个人工智能系统，能够以接近人类奥林匹克金牌得主的水平解决复杂的几何问题。它将神经语言模型与规则约束推演引擎相结合，可以解决 25 个出问题的问题在标准时限内完成 30 道奥林匹克几何问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#alphageometry-an-olympiad-level-ai-system-for-geometry" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39029801" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;婴儿计算机工程（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://computerengineeringforbabies.com/产品/computer-engineering-for-babies</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T21:56:35.356622Z</updated>; <link href="https://computerengineeringforbabies.com/products/computer-engineering-for -babies"/>; <作者>; <名称>;varjag</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=varjag</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://computerengineeringforbabies.com/cdn/shop/products/computer_engineering_for_babies_book_cover_small_e218cb6c-0fb7-4e64-9f38-ff78af9bd898.jpg?v=1649792752&width=1080" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;本书使用两个按钮和一个 LED 探索了六种基本的计算机逻辑门。它使用光传感器来检测打开的页面并相应地更改操作数。 <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#computer-engineering-for-babies-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39033811 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;线性变压器毕竟更快</stitle>; <id>;https://manifestai.com/blogposts/faster-after-all/</id>; <updated>;2024-01-18T01:56:35.357049Z</已更新>; <link href="https://manifestai.com/blogposts/faster-after-all/"/>; <作者>; <name>;JoelEinbinder</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=JoelEinbinder</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://manifestai.com/m-logo-tight.png" style="width: 220px; height: 152px;" />;<br />;线性 Transformer 是经典 Transformer 的更快替代品，但初步实验表明它们训练速度更慢。然而，优化的线性 Transformer 可以产生巨大的加速并超越经典 Transformer。<a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#linear-transformers-are-faster-after-all" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=39036355" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;报告发现，私募股权拥有的医院正在伤害患者</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/health/2024/01/hospitals-slash-staff-services- Quality-of-care-when-private-equity-takes-over/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-18T02:56:35.357450Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/ health/2024/01/hospitals-slash-staff-services-quality-of-care-when-private-equity-takes-over/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;lapcat</名称>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lapcat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2020 /10/hospital-emergency-room-800x534.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;据报道，在美国收购医院的私募股权公司通过走捷径、减少服务、裁员和降低护理质量来伤害患者。这些公司还承担了大量债务并减少慈善医疗，导致收视率下降和更多医疗错误。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hospitals-owned-by-private-equity-are-harming-病人-reports-查找" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39036526" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;嘴里的鼠标'：新设备允许用户滚动用舌头</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nbcnews.com/tech/tech-news/tongue-control-touchscreens-hit-market-year-rcna133270</id>; <更新>;2024-01- 17T22:56:35.358258Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nbcnews.com/tech/tech-news/tongue-control-touchscreens-hit-market-year-rcna133270"/>; <作者>; <name>;cannibalXxx</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cannibalXxx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /media-cldnry.s-nbcnews.com/image/upload/t_fit-760w,f_auto,q_auto:best/rockcms/2024-01/240110-augmental-MouthPad-al-1201-dfa623.jpg" style="width: 220 像素； height: 147px;" />;<br />;一种名为 MouthPad^ 的新设备允许用户仅使用舌头滚动智能手机。它是一种类似固定器的触控板芯片，位于上颚，可以感知舌头运动，使用户能够滚动、打字、打电话和玩游戏。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-mouse-for-your-mouth-new-device-allows-users-to- scroll-with-their-tongues" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38997930" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;三星将 Android 和安全更新扩展到7 年</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cnet.com/tech/mobile/samsung-extends-android-and-security-updates-to-7-years/</id>; <更新>;2024- 01-18T00:56:35.359458Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cnet.com/tech/mobile/samsung-extends-android-and-security-updates-to-7-years/" />; <作者>; <名称>;ksec</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ksec</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://www.cnet.com/a/img/resize/41700674b74f90993f9b4aab5ef8c838b0a23d05/hub/2024/01/17/1a1b3e84-245d-4f90-bf0e-7c6aca68cc20/img-1858.jpg?auto=webp&fit=cro p&高度= 675&宽度=1200" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;三星扩展了其手机的操作系统和安全更新，提供了七年的安全更新和七代Android升级。这比之前五年的安全更新和安全更新有了显着的增长。四年的操作系统更新。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#samsung-extends-android-and-security-updates-to-7-years" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39035540" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;K/simple：Arthur Whitney 用于教育目的的小型 K 解释器</stitle>; <id>;https:// github.com/kparc/ksimple</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T16:56:35.359848Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/kparc/ksimple"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; <id>;https://twitter.com/TimSweeneyEpic/status/1747408148799881390</id>; <updated>;2024-01 -17T23：56：35.360242Z </更新>; <link href =“https://twitter.com/TimSweeneyEpic/status/1747408148799881390”/>; <作者>; <名称>; sdepablos </名称>; <uri>; https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sdepablos</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心 - 让我们再试一次。<a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-s-bad-faith-27-tax-on-web-purchases" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=39034951" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Shadeup – 一种让 WebGPU 更容易的语言</stitle>; <id>;https://shadeup.dev/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T17 :56:35.361056Z</updated>; <link href="https://shadeup.dev/"/>; <作者>; <name>;jrmydev</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=jrmydev</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://shadeup.dev/editor.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 106px;" />;<br />;Shadeup 是一种旨在使着色器变得轻而易举的语言。由 WebGPU 提供支持，从 TypeScript 扩展，旨在最大限度地减少样板文件 Shadeup 抽象了管道、缓冲区、制服和其他样板文件的过程让您花更多时间进行修补，减少打字时间。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-shadeup-a-language-that-makes-webgpu-easier" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39030510" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用电致发光线对发光纺织品进行机绣</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.science.org/doi/10.1126/sciadv.adk4295</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T18:56:35.362223Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.science.org /doi/10.1126/sciadv.adk4295"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#machine-embroidery-of-light-emitting-textiles-with-electricluminescent-threads" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39031152" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MRISC32 – 开放式 32 位 RISC/Vector ISA（适用于 FPGA CPU）</stitle>; <id>;https ://mrisc32.bitsnbites.eu/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T19:56:35.362625Z</更新>; <link href="https://mrisc32.bitsnbites.eu/"/>; <作者>; <name>;peter_d_sherman</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=peter_d_sherman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //mrisc32.bitsnbites.eu/media/mrisc32-a1-pipeline-250.png" style="width: 220px;高度：92px;" />;<br />; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mrisc32-an-open-32-bit-risc-vector-isa-suitable-for-fpga-cpu " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39031989" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于离开 Google 的常见问题解答</stitle>; <id>;https:// /social.clawhammer.net/blog/posts/2024-01-10-GoogleExitLetter/</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T22:56:35.363019Z</更新>; <link href="https://social .clawhammer.net/blog/posts/2024-01-10-GoogleExitLetter/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mrled</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mrled< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://social.clawhammer.net/blog/images/eng-chi-2006.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;当我被 Google 解雇时，我写了这个常见问题解答，与朋友和家人分享，并帮助我的同事了解裁员情况。Google 最近又进行了一轮裁员，我是其中的一部分。Google 似乎正在实施通用举措来节省运营成本，而且很可能是一些启发式的决定，即使没有我，该业务也能做得很好。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# faq-on-leaving-google" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39034277" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;播客行业的萎缩令人难以置信</ stitle>; <id>;https://www.semafor.com/article/01/14/2024/the-incredible-shrinking-podcast-industry</id>; <更新>;2024-01-18T01:56:35.363404Z< /updated>; <link href="https://www.semafor.com/article/01/14/2024/the-incredible-shrinking-podcast-industry"/>; <作者>; <名称>;marban</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=marban</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://img.semafor.com/913bff53fbe5522ccf52e18af033fa23aa9aa322- 1280x854.png?w=1400&q=75&auto=格式" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Apple 对其播客报告进行了更改，导致一些最大的播客的听众人数大幅下降。这一转变本质上是技术性的，涉及关闭播客的自动下载过去两周内没有听过五集节目的用户。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-incredible-shrinking-podcast-industry" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39000425" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Htmldocs – 使用 HTML/CSS 排版并生成 pdf</stitle>; <id>;https ://htmldocs.com</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T13:56:35.363818Z</更新>; <link href="https://htmldocs.com"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kelvinzhang< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kelvinzhang</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://htmldocs.com/ og-image.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;在线文档编辑器，用于从 HTML/CSS 创建和自动生成 PDF 文档。无需安装，REST API，免费使用。数百个模板，包括发票、报告、简历、法律文件等。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-htmldocs-typeset-and-generate-pdfs-with-html-css" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39027543" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;John Lasseter 绘制了 BSD 守护进程徽标</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jacobelder.com /2024/01/17/director-of-toy-story-also-drew-bsd-daemon.html</id>; <更新>;2024-01-17T17:56:35.364206Z</更新>; <link href=" https://www.jacobelder.com/2024/01/17/director-of-toy-story-also-drew-bsd-daemon.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jelder</名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jelder</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.jacobelder.com/assets/IMG_0045。 jpeg"样式="宽度：220px； height: 165px;" />;<br />;在十几岁和二十出头的时候，作者对计算和互联网的历史着迷。他在 MIT 跳蚤市场发现了一套 4.3 BSD 手册，其中包括两本完全相同的副本这些书籍以标志性的 BSD Daemon 吉祥物为特色，该吉祥物是由《玩具总动员》和其他皮克斯电影的导演约翰·拉塞特绘制的。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#john- lasseter-drew-the-bsd-daemon-logo" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39030991" target="_blank ">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;已发送 48,000 家公司关于单个人的 Facebook 数据</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2024/1/17/24041897/facebook-meta-targeted-advertising-data-mining-study-privacy</id>; <更新>;2024-01-18T00:56:35.364594Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com/2024/1/17/24041897/facebook-meta-targeted-advertising-data- Mining-study-privacy"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:2040x1360/2400x1600/filters:focal(1020x680:1021x681):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn. com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/23951344/STK040_VRG_Illo_N_Barclay_4_facebook.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;《消费者报告》的一项研究发现，每个人的 Facebook 数据存储中都有数千家公司贡献。一个极端的例子表明，在单个志愿者的数据中发现了近 48,000 家不同的公司。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#48000-companies-sent-facebook-data-on-a-single-person" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39035536" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FPGA 上的 Quake (MRISC32 CPU) [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://vimeo.com/901506667</id>; <已更新>;2024-01-17T16:56:35.365010Z</updated>; <link href="https://vimeo.com/901506667"/>; <author>; <name>;mbitsnbites</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mbitsnbites</uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>;<iframe src =“//player.vimeo.com/video/901506667”frameborder =“0”allowfullscreen load="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quake-on-an-fpga-mrisc32-cpu-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39029529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Willow 协议</stitle>; <id>;https://willowprotocol.org/</id>; <更新>;2024 -01-17T12:56:35.365412Z</updated>; <link href="https://willowprotocol.org/"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://willowprotocol.org/emblem.png" style="width: 220px; height: 95px;" />;<br />;用于点对点数据存储的协议。最好的部分？细粒度的权限、敏锐的隐私方法、破坏性编辑以及精致的带宽和内存占用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#willow-protocol" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 39026791" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Apple 构建 iCloud 来存储数十亿个数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://read.engineerscodex.com/p/how-apple-built-icloud-to-store-billions</id>; <updated>; 2024-01-17T15:56:35.365806Z</更新>; <link href="https://read.engineerscodex.com/p/how-apple-built-icloud-to-store-billions"/>; <作者>; <name>;gempir</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gempir</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F04555898-3133-4b9f -a1e4-063ef4cebbb5_1600x900.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Apple 使用 FoundationDB 和 Cassandra 构建了 iCloud，在其极端的多租户架构中存储了数十亿个数据库。它们使用异步处理来隐藏用户的延迟，并通过一种抽象处理不同的数据需求。记录层构建在 FoundationDB 之上，为 CloudKit 提供关系数据库并支持极端多租户。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-built-icloud-to-store-billions -of-databases" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39028672" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</内容>; </条目>; </提要>;
